name: Autum and Curses
description:
Get ready for a new adventure with Autum and Curses.

For years, the villagers of Grassingham have lived happily in their idyllic community. But during a brutal series of blizzards, a strange curse falls upon their surroundings. Almost everyone left the village except for one villager which did not wanted to leave. You are the hero that everyone was expecting to find the cause of the curse and release them from this curse. Will you be able to make it?

Explain the innovative ways in which you used SoulLink Spawner:

-Soullink Spawner was used to : -spawn AI wildlife procedurally using biome feature.
                                                                       -spawn AI cursed man with spawn area and spawn point
                                                                      -spawn Town man with spawn area point

                                                                     -spawn Orcs and final boss with spawn area point.

Originally planned to spawn more wildlife, like birds and much more, might add them afterwards..

Controls:
Move: WASD
Jump: Space
Sprint: Shift
Use sword: Left click
Escape to open Save/Quit menu.
Press J to open Journal.

(Tip to use mouse in Journal as i did not had the time to check how to make it work directly: Press Esc to open save menu and then J to open Journal, then Resume to close save menu and you can use mouse to navigate in Journal) - I will fix that :)

Known issues: 
Close to orcs, there is some kind of invisible collider, most likely due to the audio zone, which the player controller sees it as a collider, but you can move to the left or right and move forward.
Scene is a bit too dark, I was not able to properly get lighting done.
